name: Infommi
description: Fight against a wave of monsters and bullet hell bosses with multiple characters of your choice that have different abilities to help you get to their Ultimate Master. Are you ready to take them on?!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4330TE Processor Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Toaster DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660+ DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 100 MB available space
